</em></p>

5. September 2023
<p>South African economy increased by 0.6% q-o-q in the the second quarter of 2023 following an increase of 0.4% in the first quarter of the year.

</em></p>

1. September 2023
<p>The South African Reserve Bank biennial conference 2023 closes in Cape Town under thematic of “Post crisis lessons and policy challenges”.

</em></p>

23. August 2023
<p>The annual inflation continues to decrease in July 2023, reaching 4.7% from 5.4% in the previous month.

</em></p>

15. August 2023
<p>The South African labour market recored a small decrease in the unemployment in the second quarter of 2023. The rate remains high at 32.6%.

</em></p>
